p: Original sequence data are available from the Influenza Research Database (IRD, up to December 31, 2018) ( Zhang etÂ al. 2017) via the website of www.fludb.org and from the Global Initiative on Sharing All Influenza Data (GISAID) (Shu and McCauley 2017) via the website of www.gisad.org. All the original data for the results are available online: https://github.com/Jamalijama/Predict_IAV_Host.
